abstract: “Like all of my exchanges with the president, the call was pretty straightforward. He briefed me, walked me through it, I shared some of my concerns, and thanked him for calling.” — Speaker John A. Boehner, recounting his telephone call with President Obama about a prospective nuclear deal with Iran.

headline.main: Verbatim: Boehner Shares Iran Concerns With Obama
